Des_Moines.Ruan Center: The Ruan Center is a high-rise office building located at 666 Grand Avenue in Des Moines, Iowa which was built by Ruan Transportation. The building was completed in 1975 and stands at a height of 459.68 ft (140m), making it the tallest building in Iowa until the completion of 801 Grand in 1991, and is currently the second tallest. The south side of the building's site was formerly occupied by The Chamberlain Hotel.
